headerText: Layouts can change when screen resolutions change. The alignment classes help you position your text based on viewport size.
howText: The helper classes apply **text-alignment** to an element. These classes can be applied using the following format `text-{screen}-{alignment}` with `{screen}` being the [viewport size](/framework/display) and `{alignment}` being the text alignment as described below:
alignments: `start` - aligns text to the left in LTR mode and to the right in RTL mode
`end` - aligns text to the right in LTR mode and to the left in RTL mode
